WRITING.TITLE: Tales of mere existence: What's your body image?
I would very much like to begin dressing like true Classy Lady, but have no idea where to begin. Advice?
WRITING.TEXT: Basically I would like to switch my wardrobe from a hodgepodge of well, shit, to a more timeless, classic look. Any help on where to start? If it helps I'm a 34D, 28inch waist, 36 inch hips and 38 inch butt. Kinda top and bottom heavy. Anyway, thanks in advance ladies!!

WRITING.TITLE: Help! I killed all my curls by dying it too much, how can I get life back into my hair?
WRITING.TEXT: I've been dying my hair since I was 14(Now 20). My hair no longer curls like it used to, no matter what I use. I use stuff like Redkin ringlet 07, Deva curl products, ect. PLEASE HELP! I'm desperate. I used to have ringlet curls, and now it just kind of frizzes and fluffs.

I got really wasted, and when my friends tried to put me to bed I stripped down to my panties, bounced up and down on the bed grabbing my boobs singing "I love my titties"

a mix of non iodized kosher sea salt and water, heated in the microwave for about 15 seconds. soak a paper towel in the hot salt water and let the wet paper towel sit on the piercing for 5 minutes. do this twice a day until it is healed, for a month or two. don't play with it! that's how bacteria gets to it.
source: 20 piercings, including 2 conch. good luck!
